articles.title: U.S. offers Russia deal to bring home basketball star Brittney Griner - CBC Sports
articles.description: The Biden administration has offered a deal to Russia aimed at bringing home WNBA star Brittney Griner and another jailed American, Paul Whelan, Secretary of State Antony Blinken said Wednesday.

articles.title: CNN Exclusive: Biden administration offers convicted Russian arms dealer in exchange for Griner, Whelan - CNN
